error.unique_id_already_in_use: Already configured: A camera with this unique ID has already been configured.
error.unable_still_load: Unable to load valid image from still image URL (e.g. invalid host, URL or authentication failure).  Review log for more info.
error.no_still_image_or_stream_url: You must specify at least a still image or stream URL
error.invalid_still_image: URL did not return a valid still image
error.stream_no_route_to_host: Could not find host while trying to connect to stream
error.stream_io_error: Input/Output error while trying to connect to stream. Wrong RTSP transport protocol?
error.stream_unauthorised: Authorisation failed while trying to connect to stream
error.stream_not_permitted: Operation not permitted while trying to connect to stream. Wrong RTSP transport protocol?

user.description: Enter the settings to connect to the camera.
user.title: Set up Generic IP Camera
